summary: A middle-aged woman walks out on her husband and family in an desperate attempt to find herself.
cast: Jean Simmons|John Forsythe|Shirley Jones|Lloyd Bridges|Teresa Wright|Dick Shawn|Nanette Fabray|Bobby Darin|Tina Louise|Kathy Fields|Karen Steele|Gail Hensley|Eve Brent|William O'Connell|Barry Cahill|Miriam Blake|Humphrey Bogart|Clark Gable|John Gallaudet|Jack LaLanne|Erin Moran|Pat Nixon|Richard Nixon|Queen Elizabeth II|Nanci Roberts
title: Con los ojos cerrados
